short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donuts flood the screen of Candy Crush Saga and create the Donut Crush Saga game!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Donuts flood the screen of Candy Crush Saga and create the Donut Crush Saga game! Swap colored donut pairs to make match 3's and even make many donut combinations.

We wish you a good time playing our game, please do not forget to share your thoughts about the game.

This extension provides additional games,


Providing users with more games to choose
